originalText.text: She is really good, attentive, and above all willing to help me in my case, I am very happy with her service, she did a really good job, she helped my family a lot, thank you ❤️❤️❤️❤️

originalText.text:
I am deeply saddened and disappointed to write this review about Ms. Apt-Dudfield, a social worker who not only failed to uphold professional standards but also demonstrated unethical behavior.

From the beginning, she showed a lack of professionalism by making judgmental comments about individuals struggling with addiction. Instead of providing compassionate support and understanding, as one would expect from a social worker, she perpetuated the negative stigma surrounding those who face such challenges. Her attitude was counterproductive and went against the very principles that social work is meant to represent.

Furthermore, "Olga" crossed ethical boundaries by actively pursuing an inappropriate unprofessional relationship with my fiancée. This action is a blatant violation of the trust that clients place in their social workers, as well as a breach of the code of ethics that governs the profession. This inappropriate behavior caused significant distress and negatively impacted my life.

I strongly urge potential clients to reconsider before entrusting her with their personal struggles and mental health needs. A social worker should be a source of empathy and support, not an additional cause for concern.

Please be cautious and consider seeking help from a professional who truly upholds the values and standards of the social work profession.
